title: CheCha - With ADA Wallets
description: Zimbabweans have insufficient small change USD cash to match the purchases of goods or services, CheCha was developed to solve that
solution: Implement into an existing close-loop digital voucher system, a mobile app called CheCha, an ADA wallet with an exchange mechanism
experience: Software Architect (10+ years) specializing in high TPS system, both in Telecom and Fin-tech industries
